content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_file_formats WHERE name = 'SynapseParquetFormat') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT [SynapseParquetFormat] 
	WITH ( FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET)
GO

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.external_data_sources WHERE name = 'gold_adlslambda_dfs_core_windows_net') 
	CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE [gold_adlslambda_dfs_core_windows_net] 
	WITH (
		LOCATION = 'abfss://gold@adlslambda.dfs.core.windows.net' 
	)
GO

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE [Dim].[Age] (
	[Age] int,
	[AgeGroup] nvarchar(4000),
	[AgeID] bigint
	)
	WITH (
	LOCATION = 'Dim/age/**',
	DATA_SOURCE = [gold_adlslambda_dfs_core_windows_net],
	FILE_FORMAT = [SynapseParquetFormat]
	)
GO


SELECT TOP 100 * FROM [Dim].[Age]
GO
